quotes.quote: Tomorrow changes the face of reality.
The greatest thing about tomorrow is, I will be better than I am today.
Tomorrow is not guarantee to anyone,no expectations no disappointment.
The vision of your tomorrow that you have today strengthens you for the morrow.
You've got to believe in the possibilities. You've got to believe that tomorrow can be better than today. And here's the big one. Believe in yourself.
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
Tomorrow, I will take on all of these things. I will be unstoppable.
The sun will come out tomorrow so you gotta hang on 'til tomorrow, come what may! tomorrow, tomorrow, I love ya, tomorrow you're only a day away!
Tomorrow will never call to ask your opinion; you don't control it. Stop allowing today's possibilities to be robbed by tomorrow's insecurities.
Tomorrow belongs to those who can hear it coming.
Tomorrow is a thief of pleasure.
Tomorrow, chased by time, flies before us to eternity a point that can never be reached.
Yesterday's just a memory, tomorrow is never what it's supposed to be.
Your hand can seize today, but not tomorrow; and thoughts of your tomorrow are nothing but desire.
Tomorrow is not given to anyone. What is given is the now enjoy each minuet as if it were to be the last.
Every tomorrow is an outcome of what I do today, and the beauty of it all is that today is happening all the time.
People were always getting ready for tomorrow. I didn't believe in that. Tomorrow wasn't getting ready for them. It didn't even know they were there.
Today is your own. Tomorrow perchance may never come.
For a better tomorrow, forget about the past, make new start, live for today and don't let anything hold you back.
Tomorrow is fully for those who have fully lived today. Hope without plans is like a car without wheels.
Tomorrow is the next step in life not the next stop in life.
Don't follow in any footprints, make your own prints. Because, you are the future of tomorrow.
Tomorrow, you promise yourself, things will be different, yet, tomorrow is too often a repetition of today. And you disappoint yourself again and again.
Tomorrow will be more hopeful than this awful piece of time we call today.
Tomorrow belongs to those who are sincerely learning and loving today.
Tomorrow the mirrors will mock me.
Tomorrow is the most important thing in life. Comes into us at midnight very clean. It's perfect when it arrives and it puts itself in our hands. It hopes we've learned something from yesterday.
Tomorrow is another opportunity to relentlessly and confidently push harder with your dream. You definitely haven't given it your all until you are living in its reality.
Tomorrow is a new day and it takes one ball to get you out but I am feeling confident and a double hundred is a possibility.
Tomorrows were full of awful things. Today, now, was the essential.
